```python
"""

# Extracting email addresses using regular expressions
emails = re.findall(r'\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\b', search_results)

# Organizing emails systematically
organized_emails = {}
for email in emails:
    domain = email.split('@')[1]
    if domain not in organized_emails:
        organized_emails[domain] = [email]
    else:
        organized_emails[domain].append(email)

print("Extracted and organized emails:")
for domain, email_list in organized_emails.items():
    print(f"Domain: {domain}")
    for email in email_list:
        print(email)
    print()
```
